short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quality Of Life Fixes For DGN

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: There are a lot of areas of Disc Golf Network that have been asked to be improved and I figured I could try to fix some of those issues with this extension. Currently, the additional features are for video playback. I hope you like it and be sure to let me know other features you want added!
